workouts.name: Full body
workouts.description: Complete workout for all muscle groups

workouts.name: Upper body
workouts.description: Focus on arms, chest, and back

tips: Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
Lower your chest until elbows are at 90 degrees
Engage your core throughout the movement
Keep your weight on your heels
Push your knees out in line with your toes
Keep your chest up and back straight
Keep your body in a straight line
Don't let your hips sag or pike up
Breathe normally throughout the hold
Keep your front knee over your ankle
Lower until both knees are at 90 degrees
Keep your torso upright and core engaged
Keep your core tight and hips level
Drive your knees toward your chest quickly
Maintain a steady breathing rhythm
Land softly when jumping back into plank
Keep the movement fluid and controlled
Jump explosively at the end of each rep
Form an inverted V with your body
Lower your head toward the ground between your hands
Focus on shoulder engagement
Keep your elbows pointing backward, not out
Lower until elbows are at 90 degrees
Keep your core engaged and back close to the surface
Start in a strong plank position
Push your hips up and back smoothly
Return to plank with control
Start with feet on wall and walk them up gradually
Keep arms straight and shoulders engaged
Practice against a wall for safety
Form a diamond shape with your hands
Keep elbows close to your body
Lower slowly and push up with control
Keep one leg extended throughout
Squeeze your glutes at the top
Don't let your hips rotate
Keep your back flat against the wall
Thighs should be parallel to the ground
Breathe normally throughout the hold
Rise up onto the balls of your feet
Pause at the top of the movement
Lower down slowly with control
Land softly with bent knees
Explode up from the bottom of the squat
Keep your core engaged throughout
